tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE drug_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
  report_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  efficacy_rating INT NOT NULL,
  safety_rating INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  drug_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES DrugData(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ReportData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  patient_id INT,
  efficacy_score INT,
  safety_score INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES PatientData(id)
);

CREATE TABLE DrugStudyData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    patient_id INT,
    study_date DATE,
    efficacy_score INT,
    safety_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE StudyResults (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    result_details TEXT,
    conclusion TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DrugInformation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    usage_instructions TEXT,
    side_effects TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id bigint PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name varchar(255),
    age int,
    weight float,
    gender varchar(10)
);

CREATE TABLE report_data (
    report_id bigint PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_id bigint,
    patient_id bigint,
    report_date timestamp,
    report_type varchar(20)
);
